data.name: Ballistic Zen
data.detailed_description:
Ballistic Zen is a first person open world platformer using a unique movement system based on old-school air-strafing, updated for the modern age. Simple to pick up but difficult to master, Ballistic Zen celebrates the joy and meditation of movement in games.

You play as Danny, a down-on-his-luck teenager who skates around the city on his hoverblades.

Find collectables and beat time trials to earn the respect of Danny's peers, who will unlock new locations and share their backstories.

Key Features

  • Unique movement system based on old-school air-strafing
  • Wallrunning!
  • Play one handed with just a mouse!
  • Open world with 5 planned areas
  • 30+ challenging collectables
  • 10+ time trials
  • 5 planned NPCs with unique backstories

Shoutouts

  • Trailer Music: Doctor Dreamchip

Minimum:
